mapper.update:
update t_purchase
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inp_price = #{inpPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
all_inp_price = #{allInpPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inp_num = #{inpNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inp_time = #{inpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_person = #{operatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_purchase set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inp_price = #{inpPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, all_inp_price = #{allInpPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inp_num = #{inpNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inp_time = #{inpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_person = #{operatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
